verses.verse: And it came to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of two <S%H3117>full<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H2492>dreamed<s%>: <S%H5975>and<s%>, behold, he stood by the <S%H2975>river<s%>.

<S%H5927>And<s%>, behold, there came up out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H4758>favored<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> and fat <S%H1277>fleshed<s%>; and they <S%H7462>fed<s%> in a <S%H260>meadow<s%>.

<S%H7651>And<s%>, behold, seven <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%> out of the <S%H2975>river<s%>, <S%H7451>ill<s%> <S%H4758>favored<s%> and lean <S%H1851>fleshed<s%>; and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>by<s%> the other <S%H6510>cows<s%> upon the <S%H8193>brink<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>.

And the <S%H7451>ill<s%> <S%H4758>favored<s%> and lean <S%H1851>fleshed<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> did eat <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H4758>favored<s%> and <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%>. So <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%>.

And he <S%H3462>slept<s%> and <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> the second <S%H8145>time<s%>: <S%H7651>and<s%>, behold, seven ears of <S%H7641>corn<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> upon <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>stalk<s%>, <S%H1277>plump<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%>.
<S%H7651>And<s%>, behold, seven <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> and <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind<s%> sprung <S%H6779>up<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>.

And the seven <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H1104>devoured<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1277>plump<s%> and <S%H4392>full<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%>. And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3364>awoke<s%>, <S%H2472>and<s%>, behold, it was a dream.

And it came to pass in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> that his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> was <S%H6470>troubled<s%>; and he <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for all the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and all the wise <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H6547>thereof<s%>: and Pharaoh <S%H5608>told<s%> them his <S%H2472>dream<s%>; but there was none that could <S%H6622>interpret<s%> them unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.
Then <S%H1696>spoke<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I do <S%H2142>remember<s%> my <S%H2399>faults<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>:

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> me in <S%H4929>custody<s%> in the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, both me and the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%>:

And we <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%>, I and <S%H2492>he<s%>; we dreamed each <S%H376>man<s%> according to the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of his <S%H2472>dream<s%>.

And there was there with us a young <S%H5288>man<s%>, a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%>, <S%H5650>servant<s%> to the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>; and we <S%H5608>told<s%> <S%H6622>him<s%>, and he interpreted to us our <S%H2472>dreams<s%>; to each <S%H376>man<s%> according to his <S%H2472>dream<s%> he did <S%H6622>interpret<s%>.
And it came to <S%H6622>pass<s%>, as he interpreted to <S%H7725>us<s%>, so it was; me he restored unto my <S%H3653>office<s%>, and him he <S%H8518>hanged<s%>.

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and they brought him <S%H7323>hastily<s%> out of the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>: and he <S%H1548>shaved<s%> <S%H2498>himself<s%>, and changed his <S%H8071>clothes<s%>, and came <S%H935>in<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, I have <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and there is none that can <S%H6622>interpret<s%> <S%H8085>it<s%>: and I have heard <S%H559>say<s%> of you that you can <S%H8085>understand<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> to interpret <S%H6622>it<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, It is not in <S%H1107>me<s%>: <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H6030>give<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> an <S%H6030>answer<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, In my <S%H2472>dream<s%>, <S%H5975>behold<s%>, I stood upon the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H2975>river<s%>:

<S%H5927>And<s%>, behold, there came up out of the <S%H2975>river<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%>, fat <S%H1277>fleshed<s%> and <S%H3303>well<s%> <S%H8389>favored<s%>; and they <S%H7462>fed<s%> in a <S%H260>meadow<s%>:

<S%H7651>And<s%>, behold, seven <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>, <S%H1803>poor<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7451>ill<s%> <S%H8389>favored<s%> and lean <S%H7534>fleshed<s%>, <S%H2007>such<s%> as I <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H7455>badness<s%>:
And the <S%H7534>lean<s%> and the ill <S%H7451>favored<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> did eat <S%H398>up<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%>:

And when they had eaten them <S%H935>up<s%>, it could not be <S%H3045>known<s%> that they had eaten <S%H935>them<s%>; but they were <S%H4758>still<s%> ill <S%H7451>favored<s%>, as at the <S%H8462>beginning<s%>. So I <S%H3364>awoke<s%>.
And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> in my <S%H2472>dream<s%>, <S%H7651>and<s%>, behold, seven <S%H7641>ears<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>stalk<s%>, <S%H4392>full<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%>:
<S%H7651>And<s%>, behold, seven <S%H7641>ears<s%>, <S%H6798>withered<s%>, <S%H1851>thin<s%>, and <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind<s%>, sprung <S%H6779>up<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%>:

And the <S%H1851>thin<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H1104>devoured<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%>: and I <S%H559>told<s%> this unto the <S%H2748>magicians<s%>; but there was none that could declare it to <S%H5046>me<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, The <S%H2472>dream<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> is <S%H259>one<s%>: <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5046>shown<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> what he is about to <S%H6213>do<s%>.

The <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; and the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>: the <S%H2472>dream<s%> is <S%H259>one<s%>.

And the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7534>thin<s%> and ill <S%H7451>favored<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> that came <S%H5927>up<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; and the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7386>empty<s%> <S%H7641>ears<s%> <S%H7710>blasted<s%> with the east <S%H6921>wind<s%> shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%>.
This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>: What <S%H430>God<s%> is about to <S%H6213>do<s%> he <S%H7200>showed<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>.
<S%H935>Behold<s%>, there come <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7647>plenty<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

And there shall <S%H6965>arise<s%> after <S%H310>them<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%>; and all the <S%H7647>plenty<s%> shall be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>;

And the <S%H7647>plenty<s%> shall not be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of that <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H310>following<s%>; for it shall be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>severe<s%>.

And for that the <S%H2472>dream<s%> was <S%H8138>doubled<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6471>twice<s%>; it is because the <S%H1697>thing<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H4116>shortly<s%> bring it to <S%H6213>pass<s%>.
Now therefore let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> look <S%H7200>out<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H995>discreet<s%> and <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and <S%H7896>set<s%> him over the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6485>this<s%>, and let him appoint <S%H6496>officers<s%> over the <S%H776>land<s%>, and take up the fifth <S%H2567>part<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7647>plentiful<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And let them <S%H6908>gather<s%> all the <S%H400>food<s%> of those <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> that <S%H935>come<s%>, and lay <S%H6651>up<s%> <S%H1250>corn<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and let them <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%>.

And that <S%H400>food<s%> shall be for <S%H6487>store<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> against the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%>, which shall be in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; that the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3772>perish<s%> not through the <S%H7458>famine<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was <S%H3190>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, Can we <S%H4672>find<s%> such a one as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>is<s%>, a man in <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of God <S%H430>is<s%>?

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H310>Seeing<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3045>shown<s%> you all <S%H995>this<s%>, there is none so discreet and wise as you <S%H2450>are<s%>

you shall <S%H1961>be<s%> over my <S%H1004>house<s%>, and according unto your <S%H6310>word<s%> shall all my <S%H5971>people<s%> be <S%H5401>ruled<s%>: only in the <S%H3678>throne<s%> will I be greater than <S%H1431>you<s%>
And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, I have <S%H5414>set<s%> you over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> took <S%H5493>off<s%> his <S%H2885>ring<s%> from his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> it upon <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> him in <S%H899>robes<s%> of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H7242>chain<s%> about his <S%H6677>neck<s%>;

And he made him to <S%H7392>ride<s%> in the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H4818>chariot<s%> which he <S%H7121>had<s%>; and they cried before <S%H6440>him<s%>, Bow the <S%H86>knee<s%>: and he <S%H5414>made<s%> him ruler over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, I am <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H1107>outside<s%> you shall no <S%H376>man<s%> lift <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> or <S%H7272>foot<s%> in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6847>Zaphnath<s%>–paaneah; and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> him to <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H621>Asenath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Poti<s%>–pherah <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On<s%>. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>. And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and went <S%H5674>throughout<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7647>plentiful<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> brought <S%H6213>forth<s%> by <S%H7062>handfuls<s%>.

And he gathered <S%H6908>up<s%> all the <S%H400>food<s%> of the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, which were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and laid <S%H5414>up<s%> the <S%H400>food<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%>: the <S%H400>food<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, which was round <S%H5439>about<s%> every <S%H5892>city<s%>, laid he <S%H5414>up<s%> in the <S%H8432>same<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6651>gathered<s%> <S%H1250>corn<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%>, until he <S%H2308>stopped<s%> <S%H5608>numbering<s%>; for it was <S%H369>outside<s%> <S%H4557>number<s%>.

And unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> before the <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>, which <S%H621>Asenath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Poti<s%>–pherah <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On<s%> gave birth to unto <S%H3205>him<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: For <S%H430>God<s%>, said <S%H5382>he<s%>, has made me forget all my <S%H5999>toil<s%>, and all my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> he <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: For <S%H430>God<s%> has caused me to be <S%H6509>fruitful<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of my <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
And the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7647>plenty<s%>, that was in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, were <S%H3615>ended<s%>.

And the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%>, according as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%>: and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was in all <S%H776>lands<s%>; but in all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> there was <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

And when all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> was <S%H7456>famished<s%>, the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> for <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto all the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; what he <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H6213>you<s%>, do.

And the <S%H7458>famine<s%> was over all the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6605>opened<s%> all the <S%H7666>storehouses<s%>, and sold unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>; and the <S%H7458>famine<s%> grew <S%H2388>severe<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And all <S%H776>countries<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> for to <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H7458>corn<s%>; because that the famine was so <S%H2388>severe<s%> in all <S%H776>lands<s%>.
